name: Poached Plums
keywords: dessert, side dish, plum, vanilla bean, summer, vegan, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Stir sugar and water together in a 2 1/2-quart souffle dish. Add cinnamon stick. Cook, uncovered, at 100 percent in a high-power oven for 3 minutes. Stir thoroughly, making sure there are no grains on the bottom of the dish. Cover with a lid or microwave plastic wrap. Cook for 6 minutes. Prick plastic, if used, to release steam.
Remove from oven and uncover. Stir in lemon zest and vanilla bean. Add plums. Cook, covered, at 100 percent power in a high-power oven for 8 minutes.
Remove from oven and uncover. Let cool. Remove vanilla bean and store, tightly covered, in the refrigerator.
Serve chilled, in a bowl, with some of the syrup.
